title: Visualizing Corporate vs. Live-in Landlords
description: An exploratory analysis of the relationships between corporate ownership rates, owner occupancy rates and demographics in Boston neighborhoods over the time period of 2004-2024.

title: Critique by Design: Viral Visualizations
description: A study in the delicate balance between data transparency and emotive storytelling in the context of visualizing COVID cases in the US from 2020-2022.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualizations
description: Contrasting visualizations of climate change indicators to argue for two different sides of a proposition.
